name: Metriql
description: Expose your Metriql datasets to data tools

METRIQL_API_AUTH_USERNAME_PASSWORD.description: Your username:password pair for basic authentication. Leave it empty if you don't want to protect

DBT_MANIFEST_JSON.description: The number of processes to run.

DBT_PROFILES_CONTENT.description: The content of dbt's profiles.yml file. You should minify yml to a single file to pass the value. (Here is an online tool: https://onlineyamltools.com/minify-yaml)
